trends: There has been one other sighting in Grand Ronde

divs: sighting detailswow, it's as though i wrote that original event description myself! i saw the exact same thing at (almost) the exact same time from my back deck in grand ronde, oregon. only difference is that i only saw two. the time was 12:00 midnight +\- 15 minutes. i ufo hunt almost every night and see all sorts of odd things and since i live in the forrest, i have excellent viewing because of zero city light interference. these were not satellites, as i've learned through the years to recognize them. sats don't stop in mid-flight, blink brightly several times and then carry forward at a different speed. i'm getting an "error" when i try to submit this report regarding the time (midnight +\- 15 minutes on aug 12, 2009 pt) so i'm going to try other "times" in order to move the report through but the actual event time is as stated avove.
